===Etymology===
The semantics may have developed along the grammaticalisation process "bamboo stalk" ({{zh-l|*箇}}) > "piece, item" > "classifier for every category of noun" > "possessive particle, generic particle". If so, it would then possibly be cognate with {{och-l|竿|bamboo, rod}}. Compare {{cog|bo|མཁར་བ}}, {{m|bo|འཁར་བ||walking stick, staff}} and {{cog|th|ก้าน||stem, stalk}}.

# [[single]]; [[alone]]

# {{n-g|The generic classifier. Used with nouns lacking specific classifiers.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 有 一 個 問題。|I have a question.}}

#: {{zh-x|一 個 井|a well|C-GZ}}

#: {{zh-x|一 個 學校|one school}}

# {{lb|zh|Mandarin|colloquial}} {{n-g|Particle, placed between a verb and its object or complement, adding a sense of ease, swiftness and one-offness to the action.}}
#* {{zh-x|吃 個 飯，洗 個 澡，休息{xi} 休息{xi}|have some food, have a shower and have some rest}}
#* {{zh-x|我們 昨天 見 了 個 面，聊 了 聊 近況。|We met yesterday, and chatted about how we've been recently.}}
# {{lb|zh|Mandarin|colloquial}} {{n-g|Particle used after {{zh-l|些}}.}}
#* {{zh-x|那些 個 年 的 事 現在 回憶 起來 還是 記憶猶新。|It feels like yesterday when I reminisce about those stories in the past.}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} {{n-g|Particle used in some time-related words.}}
#* {{zh-x|今兒個|(''dialectal'') today}}
# {{lb|zh|obsolete|Wu|Xiang|Gan|dialectal Cantonese|dialectal Min}} (= {{zh-l|*搿}}) [[this]]; [[that]]
#* {{zh-x|個 個 人|this person|SH}}

#* {{zh-x|個 人 今朝 為啥 勿 來|Why hasn't that guy come today?|SH}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|Wu|Teochew}} {{n-g|Possessive particle. Equivalent to Mandarin {{zh-l|的|tr=de}}.}}
